title: What is this. low priority queue?
body: So basically I left a game because I crashed and the game said I was placed into a low priority queue. What is that ment to be about?

replies.body: Ok thanks for telling me. I got out of LPQ now. Also why can't I do something in LoL when having to wait in LPQ? Like working item sets or changing masteries or etc. Why? {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

When you are in the low priority queue you basically need to wait five minutes before you are put in the normal queue.

The low priority queue is a queue where you can't go anywhere, you just have to wait.
I hate this queue I like the old system better. I got placed into the low priority queue for taking a shower. SHOWER{{champion:267}}
Why would one get up and go for a shower while either; in queue, or already in a game...?
Because they want to ruin the game for 9 other people.
The old system never punished anyone for AFKing, New Leaver Buster is far better.
don't you have to afk more than once to get placed into priority queue?
New Leaver Buster starts giving out punishments from your first AFK then gets rougher and rougher from then on.

i know that, but they don't immediately ban you do they?

the first afk is when they make you sign something, an "i agree" thingo (never had it so idk) so if you afk again you'll be placed in low priority queue. so based on this assumption i'm assuming you have to afk more than once to get placed into low priority queue/get banned
YOu are placed in low priority and have to agree not to AFK again after your first instance of AFKing.
